item.title: Jim Cramer reveals his secrets to wealth and success
Startups are staying private longer thanks to alternative capital
item.description: The median age of companies that have gone private so far this year is 13 years since founding, up from a median of 10 years in 2018, according to new...

item.title: Median age of companies going public rises to 13

item.title: The wealth of the top 1% reaches a record $52 trillion
item.description: All wealth groups saw gains over the past year, according to recent Fed data. But the growth has been fastest for those at the very top.
